title: Piped Up
lyrics:
Ooh, bitch, bitch, yuh
Bitch, I'm piped up, sippin' sizzurp
Ayy, ayy, yuh
Ayy, uh, uh, uh
Bitch, I'm piped up, sippin' sizzurp
Ooh, yeah

Wockhardt, bitch, yuh, ooh

Ew, ew, ew, ew, ew, ew, ooh

ChaseTheMoney, ChaseTheMoney



Bitch, I'm piped up, sippin' sizzurp

That bitch said I'm icy like a blizzard, I hit her (I hit her)

Uh, ooh, yuh, ooh

Ooh, bitch, bitch, yuh

Bitch, I'm piped up, smokin' boofy (boom)

Told that bitch nigga he a goofy, he losin'

Ayy, ooh, I smoke that Nigga like a doobie

(Smoke that nigga like a dooby, ayy, bih)

Ayy, bitch, I'm piped up in a two-seat

I can't fuck with you if you a groupie (skrt, ooh)

Ooh, yuh, ooh, ooh, yuh

Ayy, yuh, ayy, ooh



Bitch, I'm piped up, totin' weapons

Choppa on me fuck a Smith & Wesson, I'm wrecking (ow, ow)

Ooh, ayy, hop up in the Jag, I left him

Ooh, ooh, yuh

Ayy, bitch, I'm piped up, poppin' Xannies (Xan)

Made that Asian bitch give up her panties, bitch

Yuh, ayy, ooh, ooh

Ayy, yuh, ayy, yuh

No, this ain't no 'Tussin, this is Wockhardt (Wock)

That bitch tryna fuck me 'cuz my Jaguar (yuh)

(Ooh, for my motherfuckin' Jaguar)

Bitch, bitch, ayy, ayy

I just piped down on a model (ew)

Now I'm tryna fuck Demi Lovato, yuh

(I'm tryna fuck Demi Lovato)

Yuh, ayy, bitch, yuh, ayy, ooh, ooh

Canary diamonds on me and they blingin' (bling)

Book a flight to Dubai for the weekend, I'm geekin'

Ooh, yuh, bitch, bitch (bitch, I'm motherfuckin' geekin')

Ayy, yuh, ayy, yuh



Bitch, I'm piped up, sippin' sizzurp (sizzurp)

That bitch said I'm icy like a blizzard, I hit her (ooh)

Uh, ooh, yuh, ooh (on my mama and my sister)

Ooh, bitch, bitch, yuh

Bitch, I'm piped up, smokin' boofy (boom)

Told that bitch nigga he a goofy, he losin'

Ayy ooh, I smoke that nigga like a doobie, ayy

(Like a motherfuckin' doobie, bitch)

Ayy, bitch, I'm piped up in a two seat (two)

I can't fuck with you if you a groupie (skrt)

Ooh, yuh, ooh, ooh, yuh

ChaseTheMoney, ChaseTheMoney
